transcript: Hi, this is Carlos Riz and my date of birthday is July 28, 1985. I'm calling because I stopped taking med for... Med for me, because it makes me dizzy.

result.recommended_next_step: Pharmacist outreach within 24 hours to address side-effect concern and adherence barrier.
result.safe_patient_reply: I appreciate you sharing this with us. We'll be in touch to discuss further. If symptoms worsen or you feel unsafe, please seek urgent care.
